players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Bob: "I am innocent and need your help to find the mafia."
You: "I am the detective and found Diana to be the mafioso"
You: "I have identified Diana as the mafioso. Bob, can you please provide any information that might help us catch her?"
Bob: "I am innocent and I believe Diana is the mafioso. Can we discuss any alibis or evidence that might support this claim?"
